strategy_reasoning: A carousel format allows us to highlight the major visual overhaul and the functional 'Select All' feature separately while maintaining the cozy narrative. The pixel art style unifies these technical updates into a 'game patch' vibe.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot holding a large pixel paintbrush, finishing a painting of a perfect lime green square. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'Visual Update'. Nostalgic and cute.
images.description: Announcing the unified visual identity and square image standardization.

images.prompt: Close-up of a cozy retro game UI menu screen floating in a soft cloud. Menu lists 'Text', 'Image', 'Video'. A pixel cursor hand hovers over a glowing lime green 'Select All' button. Soft pastel colors, mint and lavender background. Cozy 8-bit aesthetic. Clean and satisfying UI.
images.description: Visualizing the new 'Select All' category toggles for model permissions.

images.prompt: A tiny pixel adventurer character reading a large open scroll labeled 'GSOC' in a peaceful digital garden. Pixel flowers blooming around them. Soft lighting, lavender and cream background. Warm, inviting atmosphere like A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'Docs Updated'.
images.description: Highlighting the GSOC Readme and Contributing guide updates.
